title: 82/115/EEC: Commission Decision of 29 January 1982 approving the programme on the development of agriculture in the French overseas departments, pursuant to Council Directive 81/527/EEC (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 29 January 1982
approving the programme on the development of agriculture in the French overseas departments, pursuant to Council Directive 81/527/EEC
(Only the French text is authentic)
(82/115/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The programme on the development of agriculture in the French overseas departments, forwarded by the French Government pursuant to Directive 81/527/EEC on 31 August 1981, is hereby approved.
This Decision is addressed to the French Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 January 1982.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 197, 20. 7. 1981, p. 38.
